data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Šuto Orizari, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Šuto Orizari, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Šuto Orizari, North Macedonia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 17,400 people living in Šuto Orizari through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Šuto Orizari to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Albanian, Macedonian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Albanian, Macedonian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Albanian, Macedonian people is yours.
Jesus, make the 10,754 people in the state of Šuto Orizari who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Šuto Orizari hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Šuto Orizari who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
